title: 2018-09-28 - Meet CrowdStrike’s Adversary of the Month for September- COBALT SPIDER
plain_text:
# Cobalt Spider

**[crowdstrike.com/blog/meet-crowdstrikes-adversary-of-the-month-for-september-cobalt-spider/](https://www.crowdstrike.com/blog/meet-crowdstrikes-adversary-of-the-month-for-september-cobalt-spider/)**

**Adversary**

**Community Identifiers**

Cobalt Group, Cobalt Gang

## Cobalt Spider is a financially-motivated criminal group, active since 2016, responsible for campaigns against financial institutions across a variety of regions. While COBALT SPIDER initially targeted Russia and the CIS, since 2019, campaigns have focussed on targeting financial institutions in Europe, the Middle East, and Central and South America.

The adversary conducts spear phishing campaigns that frequently impersonate financial
institutions to deliver a variety of malware. COBALT SPIDER has likely monetized access to
financial institutions by conducting ATM cash-outs.
